# StoreKitError.systemError(_:)

**Case**

A system error occurred.

## Declaration

```swift
case systemError(any Error)
```

## StoreKit Error Codes

- **StoreKitError.networkError(_:)**: A network error occurred.
- **StoreKitError.userCancelled**: The user canceled.
- **StoreKitError.notAvailableInStorefront**: The function isn’t available on devices configured for this storefront.
- **StoreKitError.notEntitled**: The app doesn’t have the appropriate entitlements to use the functionality.
- **StoreKitError.unknown**: An unknown error occurred.
- **StoreKitError.unsupported**: The operation doesn’t support this product.
